message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is my bottom line. This product is highly sought after, and I'm confident in its value. I'm willing to let it go for $11,000, but that's my final offer.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still not convinced. I would like to propose a price of $10,500. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
